div.p: X62/8557, unit 749, VPRS 1189/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I have the honor to inform you, that it is my intention to proceed on my journey to the alpine ranges, for which you were pleased to grant permission, within the next days. I beg now to solicit your sanction of the following arrangement in regard to the administration of my establishment during my absence.
1 that Mr C. Wilhelmi be entrusted with the duty of carrying out the official correspondence, clerical work and whatever meanwhile may partain of my office as Botanist to the Government.
2, that on Mr E. B. Heyne of this establishment may devolve all functions connected with the practical administration of the horticultural branch of this establishment
